name: Rhythm Game
description:
Control
  • Move with ARROW KEYS
Objective
  • Don't let the yellow pellets fall into the endless VOID!
Notes From The Developer "There is no music in it because I don't how to put music in it. I might come back later to add music, but for now, turn on your MP3 player and pretend the game has music :D"
I'm new to Unity and game development so my games are bad. But I'm trying to improve my skills everyday!
